introduction.p:
<CommonDatePickerLook/>
is recommended to use when implementing this control template.

prop.name: Commands
prop.p: The type of this property is (vl::)presentation::controls::IDatePickerCommandExecutor*.
This property is set after this control template is applied to a control. It offers a way for this control template to communicate with the control.

prop.name: DateLocale
prop.p: This property defines the expected locale to show text of date concepts.

prop.name: Date
prop.p: This property defines the expected date to show.
